sentences.sContent: Intense bouquet of peach, apple, roses, characteristic of the noble Verdicchio grape. Refreshing, sapid, with a pleasant bitter almond finish.
sentences.sContent_eng: Intense bouquet of peach, apple, roses, characteristic of the noble Verdicchio grape. Refreshing, sapid, with a pleasant bitter almond finish.
sentences.sCn: 开始品尝时伴随着桃，苹果，玫瑰的香味，但有趣的是收尾的余味且是一种让人愉悦的微微苦涩的杏仁味道。

trans.tranCn: 有味道的， 滋味好的；  有趣味的
